definitions.text: food that is discarded (as from a kitchen)

examples: he declined to join the group on a hike
He refused my offer of hospitality

definitions.text: elude, especially in a baffling way

examples: he denies her her weekly allowance

definitions.text: resist immunologically the introduction of some foreign tissue or organ
examples: His body rejected the liver of the donor
They turned away hundreds of fans
Black people were often rejected by country clubs
